<h3 id="X18229">X(18229) = HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd ZANIAH AND 3rd CONWAY</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^3-2*(b+c)*a^2-(3*b^2+2*b*c+3*c^2)*a-4*(b+c)*b*c  :  :
<br>
<b>X(18229) = s^2*X(1)-3*(r^2+s^2)*X(2)</b>
<p>X(18229) lies on these lines: {1,2}, {9,1764}, {40,2050}, {188,11894}, {210,10473}, {226,17272}, {236,11896}, {312,3731}, {333,1743}, {518,11021}, {940,5783}, {958,10882}, {960,12435}, {966,3452}, {1211,5219}, {1215,5223}, {1329,10887}, {1376,10434}, {1402,4413}, {2297,16713}, {2345,5745}, {2886,10886}, {3035,13244}, {3036,12550}, {3305,5235}, {3666,17151}, {3739,5437}, {3740,10439}, {3772,17306}, {3928,4363}, {4417,17270}, {4859,10468}, {5044,10441}, {5226,5232}, {5234,6996}, {5273,10444}, {5438,10470}, {5777,12547}, {7028,11895}, {10436,14829}, {10446,18228}, {10862,18227}, {10889,18230}, {10891,18234}, {10892,18235}, {11521,15829}, {12126,18247}, {12392,18248}, {12544,18249}, {12545,18250}, {12548,18251}, {12551,18254}, {12552,18255}, {12553,18257}, {12554,18258}, {12557,18259}, {16124,18253}, {17056,17296}, {17617,18236}</p>
<p>
X(18229) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 8, 12546), (2, 5271, 2999), (2, 11679, 1), (9, 10472, 10456), (1764, 10888, 10442), (2999, 5271, 16833), (4384, 16831, 16827)<br>
</p>
